You can use the new balise #APROPOS into your templates. This balise has 4 parameters:
- if you wrote: #APROPOS{liste}, you get the list of the actives plugins, - if you wrote: #APROPOS{nombre}, you get the number of all the actives plugins AND locked plugins. - if you wrote: #APROPOS{plugins}, you get the number of the actives plugins. - if you wrote: #APROPOS{extensions}, you get the number of the actives locked plugins.
To personalize the informations which are displayed before and after the list, modify the file modeles/apropos_liste.html after copying it into your folder squelettes/modeles.
